name: PolyWarz
description:
A chaotic game of good and evil, made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

You are our last hope against the lord of chaos! Every one before you failed the mission...

Move with [wasd] & shoot with [lmb]

press your [number keys] to use powerups, but they cost you points!

1  - Teleport in the direction you are moving
2 - Heal for half your health
3 - Send an explosive shockwave damaging all enemies nearby
4 - Enter bullet-time for a life saving moment

When your health is low, time will be on your side! Bullet-Time will automatically activate.

As you move through levels, stronger enemy types will appear. You too get more powerful, as level increases your bullet count.
